reviewText: Less than a star :-( Terrible product - came damaged - the movie skips all over the place because of the damage - I cannot even give it a star - unable to see this DVD
I ordered this set of movies for my brother because he's a huge Ida Lupino fan. He just loves them, and watches them over and over again.

what can I say this is Ida Lupino  one of the greatest actress. these are short movies but
they don't let you down, you just want to see what's going to happen in the next movie.
If you like Ida Lupino you'll love these movies.
DVD arrived as expected n plays fine.
A must for every person who calls himself a cinephile.
I enjoy all Ida Lupino's Movies. She was a great actress.

Four more half hour shows featuring Ida Lupino on a DVD-R. Sound and Picture okay.  Enjoyed this series more that Vol 1. Programs are:  Masquerade, Eddie`s Place, All My Heart and One Way Out. Cast includes: John Bryant, William Talman, Walter Coy, Edward Platt, Scott Forbes, Frances Robinson, Paul Fix, John Daley, Noreen Nash and Glen Gordon. Vol. one and two are a product of their time and some of the dramas may seem outdated by today`s standards.  Still a great watch for film noir and crime drama fans.
What a versatile actress Ida Lupino was! This disc contains 4 very enjoyable episodes from her days in television. She is fascinating to watch.
